title: Fix @korporus/site Gatsby develop missing module dependencies
description: Resolve missing module errors during gatsby develop in apps/korpor.us under pnpm workspace isolation (query-string, lodash/merge, react-is and any related runtime peer imports).

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Fixed Gatsby dev module resolution under pnpm by removing the restrictive resolve.modules override in apps/korpor.us/gatsby-node.js and adding required runtime dependencies (query-string, lodash, react-is and related Gatsby/framer query-string transitive requirements). Verified with gatsby develop on port 8011 plus successful typecheck/build.
